name: RNG Wizard (Post-Jam Early Access)
description:
Welcome to RNG Wizard!
This is a silly little game I made for the GMTK 2022 Game Jam.
As I'm posting this, the jam is now in progress, so I have a different version in the jam.
If you want to rate the game, go here, don't play this version.
This game is still pretty buggy, so keep that in mind.
Use A and D to move left and right
Use S to crouch
Use SPACE to jump
Use click to navigate dialogue and remove the inventory poppup
Use click, Q, and E to cast spells from wands 1, 2, and 3 respectively
Use number keys to navigate the inventory (explained in game)
Press R to go to the death menu yourself 
(used to reset if you fall through the map or such)
ENJOY!
